She felt that keeping the baby would put both her and her boyfriend in danger, so she made the decision to have an abortion alone. 

Now, considering ethics and morality. In many places, a woman has the right to make decisions about her own body, including abortion. On the other hand, not informing her boyfriend could be seen as a breach of trust. But in a context where speaking up could lead to her death, maybe secrecy was the only option. The question is whether she is in the wrong for not telling him. But given her reasons, it's a matter of survival.

The boyfriend's wish to keep the baby is understandable, but her situation was more dire. Her actions were a result of necessity and self-preservation.
